video.title: Teresa
video.synopsis: We all want so much more than we have, but how far are we willing to go to get it?

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is just finishing high school when the secret she's kept from her boyfriend for two years is revealed, now she will lose everything.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is humiliated by her ex-boyfriend and the kids at school who found out about her economic situation, but the experience will make her stronger.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Teresa faces her enemies and swears vengeance, but in the face of rejection, she realizes her first love is still waiting for her.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Teresa makes Mariano look bad so that Aurora will lose interest in him. Mariano confronts Professor De La Barrera and saying Teresa deserves better.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Teresa and Mariano love each other and decide to get back together. Teresa shows her enemies she got into the best university despite being poor.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Teresa puts school ahead of the gymnastics competition that was so important to her sister Rosita, who dies of heart failure the same day.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is hit hard by the death of her sister and vows to do whatever it takes to escape her life of poverty.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Teresa confesses her love for Mariano to Aurora, and Aurora decides to leave the country. Teresa decides to move on despite her sister's death.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Teresa gains Luisa's trust and she tells her how her parents died and how she and her brother have suffered. Pablito's health is worrying.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is frustrated about accepting charity from Aurora to dress well at work, and won't let her parents give Pablito what little money they have.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Teresa reaffirms her oath to escape from poverty. She comforts Professor De La Barrera when she finds out he was hurt when he was left at the altar.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Professor De La Barrera gives Teresa a cell phone. Mariano receives some expensive equipment for his studies. Aurora gives Teresa some clothes.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Teresa fakes being upset Aurora left, and lies to Paloma that she's pregnant with Arturo's baby. She and Mariano go to Aurora's house in Cuernavaca.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Teresa and Mariano consummate their love at Cuernavaca. The neighborhood awaits the results of Pablito's operation at the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Teresa confesses to Professor De La Barrera she was the one who convinced Paloma to leave him. Teresa's mother suspects Teresa is with Arturo.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is worried because Arturo found out about her lies to Paloma. Teresa's mother reminds Professor De La Barrera to keep it professional with her.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is mad at everyone. Her plans might fall apart if Arturo clears things up with Paloma. Luisa visits Teresa's mother to defend her brother.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is furious with her mother and Mariano for doubting her and refuses to forgive them. Professor De La Barrera is mad at her for lying to him.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Mariano goes to talk with Arturo and convinces him to continue supporting Teresa's studies. Teresa forgives him, as she and doesn't want to lose him.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is humiliated again at the university for being poor. Her ex-boyfriend Paulo gives her a new computer in exchange for her help with schoolwork.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is accused of having a relationship with Professor De La Barrera. Teresa defends herself and teaches her enemy a lesson for her slander.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Teresa goes to the hospital to see Pablito and finds Paloma there, who warns her that Pablito is part of her family and she won't let her visit him.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Teresa fights with Mariano, who instead of giving her the ring, pawned it to help his father. He feels bad and gets money from Luisa to buy it back.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Ruben confronts Teresa for making an appointment with his daughter at the same restaurant as them to start a fight. Mariano gives Teresa the ring.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Teresa asks Mariano to do whatever he can to get her out of the neighborhood. Aurora returns from Paris and wants to surprise Teresa.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Teresa confesses to Aurora that Professor De La Barrera doesn't know she's with Mariano. Arturo plans to propose to her when she finishes her studies.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Teresa's mother faints when she finds out her husband lost his job. Arturo gives Teresa a PDA. Armando is under a lot of pressure to find a job.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Professor De La Barrera tries to talk with Teresa's father to clear up his intentions with his daughter. The apartment was for Luisa, not Teresa.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Teresa tells Mariano to invite important people to his graduation to make connections. Arturo confesses to Teresa's father he wants to marry her.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: After Teresa tells Esperanza she should check on her, she discovers Ruben's wife doesn't have cancer. Mariano and Aurora will be Pablito's godparents.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Teresa convinces Esperanza Ruben is a good man. Armando's debts almost leave the family bankrupt, but Mariano and the neighbors take up a collection.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza gives Teresa some jewelry to pay the mortgage. Teresa's father asks her for money but she refuses to share what she's been given.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Teresa breaks up with Mariano and decides to leave home to live with Professor De La Barrera. Teresa's mother suffers a pulmonary embolism.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Teresa tells Mariano that Professor De La Barrera is the ideal man. Mariano promises Teresa's mother that he'll always take care of her daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Teresa visits her mother in the hospital and assures her she's helping the family. Esperanza's parents find out the man she's with may be her father.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Teresa and Arturo kiss for the first time. Armando tells Teresa to ask Professor De La Barrera for money to stop the foreclosure. He donates the ring.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is ashamed of her father because he's working as an orderly at the hospital. Ruben asks Esperanza to live with him in his apartment.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Teresa tells everyone her godmother is going to Arturo's house to take care of her and Mariano had no reason to assault Professor De La Barrera.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Teresa arrives at Arturo's house with her godmother. Aurora demands Teresa stop leading Mariano on and tell him how she really feels.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Teresa assures her parents she wants to spend her life with Arturo. Arturo tells Mariano to accept that Teresa chose him, but Mariano won't give up.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Teresa gets a credit card to shop for the wedding. She takes a photo of Esperanza and Ruben kissing to send to Aida.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Teresa sends Aida the photo of her father kissing Esperanza. Mariano is mad at Aurora for hiding the fact that her father is the hospital director.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is ashamed her father is an orderly at the hospital. She admits to Aida that she sent the photo of her father kissing another woman.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Teresa tells Genoveva it's her fault Paulo is on drugs. Fernando tells his ex-lover Luisa is his girlfriend. Juanita spends the night with Cutberto.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Teresa confesses to Ruben she's known about his relationship with Esperanza for years. Paulo takes a drug test to show his mother he's not on drugs.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza visits Teresa at Arturo's house. Teresa notices the name Luna Turquesa elicits a reaction in Arturo. Esperanza finds out she's pregnant.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Teresa goes to Mariano to tell him she's thinking about taking him back. Esperanza is devastated when Ruben leaves her.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Mariano is disappointed in Teresa when he finds out she went to Cancún with Arturo. Mariano decides to get together with Aurora and forget Teresa.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Teresa tells Paloma not to work with Arturo. Mariano tells Teresa he's figured out she's a liar and he's done with her. Arturo won't quit the project.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Teresa tells Aurora she'll never get Mariano to fall in love with her. Teresa's parents are disappointed in her for going to Cancún with Arturo.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Drunk, Teresa tells Esperanza she's just marrying Arturo for money. Arturo asks Teresa to take him back. Paloma won't give him up without a fight.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Teresa sends Aida papers showing the supposed divorce of her parents. Teresa confesses to Arturo she was with Mariano when they were teenagers.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Aida throws ammonium in Teresa's face and blames her for Paulo's death. Mariano stops Aida from killing himself.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Arturo finds out Paloma had a stillborn child of his. Teresa is happy Arturo doesn't have any heirs to share his fortune.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Luisa gives herself to Fernando. Mariano is disappointed in Teresa for sending Aida the supposed divorce papers. Esperanza confesses she's pregnant.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Juanita is devastated when she finds out Teresa isn't going to use the wedding dress she made for her. Aida finds a new reason to live.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Teresa got her father a job as a messenger for Arturo's office. Mariano is jealous because Aurora is with Martin and doesn't have time for him.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Teresa tells Ruben if he can get Aida to stay away from the neighborhood she'll get Esperanza to leave him alone. Ruben gives Teresa another ring.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Juanita asks Aida to apologize to Teresa. Mayra demands Ruben tell her about his ex-lover. Luisa fears Fernando will forget her in Spain.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Aida tells Arturo Teresa sent her mother a photo of Ruben with another woman and the papers. Teresa is surprised to see Mariano at Paloma's auction.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is sick with jealousy when she sees Mariano kissing her worst enemy. Juanita asks Aurora's father to be her date to Teresa's wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Teresa and Mariano sleep together. She says she'll run away with him instead of marrying Arturo. Arturo doesn't know if his mother is dead or alive.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Arturo gives Teresa a car. Teresa's mother finds out about Mariano and asks her daughter not to get married. Paloma wishes Arturo the best.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Teresa swears she loves Mariano but can't give up her life with Arturo. Mayra finds out Esperanza is Ruben's lover and makes a scene at the wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza confesses her affair with Ruben to Teresa's mother. Aida is mad at Mariano for not saying anything about Esperanza and her father.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is mad at Arturo for canceling their honeymoon. Mayra offers Esperanza money to stay away from Ruben. Tito has a business proposition for Gema.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is mad at Arturo for asking her to watch her credit card spending. Fernando assures Arturo he loves Luisa and would never hurt her.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Mariano asks Paloma to introduce him to people who would want to help with the clinic. Teresa's parents refuse to live with Arturo.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Teresa assures her husband she only went out with Mariano once. Ruben is worried because Myra decided to give her daughter control over the business.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Teresa denies to her mother having slept with Mariano the day before the wedding. Dr. Ledesma offers to help Esperanza. Ruben offers her a house.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Teresa asks Paloma to leave her husband alone because she'll never break them up. Arturo tells Fernando he'll leave the money for his son with Teresa.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Teresa and Mariano have a romantic encounter. Mariano's father runs Teresa off for everything she's done to his son and threatens to tell her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Aída and Mariano tell Juana they're together. Arturo asks Mariano to respect his marriage. Arturo hears Teresa tell Aurora that Mariano was her first.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Arturo spends the night with Paloma. Mayra freaks out when she finds out Esperanza is pregnant. Teresa is worried about her husband's behavior.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Teresa confesses to Arturo that she slept with Mariano. Genoveva tells Ruben Esperanza is with another man. Dr. Ledesma confesses his love for her.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Teresa tells her mother she's thinking about having kids with Arturo. Arturo tells Paloma they won't be seeing each other anymore.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Paloma is hit by a car before she can tell Arturo the truth. Before she dies she confesses to Teresa that she was with Arturo one night.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: Aída is furious to find out Esperanza is pregnant. Ruben offers the company lawyer hush money to keep his fraud quiet. Paloma left Arturo her fortune.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Ruben asks Esperanza about her pregnancy. Mariano gave Fito's license plate numbers to the police. Teresa confronts Arturo about his unfaithfulness.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Teresa comforts Fernando after what Arturo did to him. Fernando asks Teresa not to tell Luisa they're together. Aurora tells Aida Mariano is very sad.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Teresa asks for a divorce. Genoveva offers to raise Esperanza and Ruben's child. Juana tells Hector not to go after Teresa until she's divorced.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: Aurora confesses to Martin that she's declared her love for Mariano. Teresa assures Mariano she's divorcing Arturo.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Teresa tells Mariano she loves him and needs him to give her another chance. Martin asks Mariano if he and Aurora are more than friends.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: Mariano is furious Arturo was unfaithful to Teresa. Johnny and Paty tell Don Porfirio they're getting married. Arturo offers to take Teresa to Europe.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Arturo tells Teresa he'll divorce her if that's what she wants. Esperanza asks Mariano not to tell Mayra about her pregnancy.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: Aida accepts Mariano continuing to support Esperanza during her pregnancy. Aurora tells Teresa not to go after Mariano while still married to Arturo.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: Mariano assures Aida he's over Teresa. Fernando tries to break up with Luisa but the mother interrupts. Arturo offers to take Teresa to Europe.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: Teresa has figured out Oreana will be her new enemy. Paty invites her grandfather to the wedding. Teresa agrees to go to Europe with Arturo.
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: Teresa gives Fito some euros so that he won't talk to her husband. Mariano attends to Oreana during an attack. She offers to help with his project.
episodes.title: Episode 89

episodes.synopsis: Teresa pretends the euros were stolen from her in a robbery. Oreana helps Mariano with the clinics. Paty's grandfather tries to stop the wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 90

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Paty are married. Aida reminds Esperanza she'll never forgive her for what she did with her father. Hector shows Juana the divorce papers.
episodes.title: Episode 91

episodes.synopsis: Oreana threatens to disown Fernando if he so much as looks at Teresa. Esperanza has an argument with Ruben about her child's paternity.
episodes.title: Episode 92

episodes.synopsis: Mayra goes to the hospital to find out if Esperanza's child is her husband's. Teresa is upset when Arturo wants to sleep with her.
episodes.title: Episode 93

episodes.synopsis: Teresa decides to overlook Arturo's unfaithfulness while they're in Europe. Luisa moves in with Fernando. Aida fights with Esperanza over the baby.
episodes.title: Episode 94

episodes.synopsis: Mariano confesses to Aurora that he loves Aida. Aida tells her mother the child Esperanza is going to have is her father's.
episodes.title: Episode 95

episodes.synopsis: Aida tells her father she's going to represent her mother in the divorce. Aurora asks her mother to explain why she abandoned her.
episodes.title: Episode 96

episodes.synopsis: Hector lets Vanesa stay at Aurora's house. Aida suggests her mother think through whether or not she wants to put her father in jail for what he did.
episodes.title: Episode 97

episodes.synopsis: Aurora tells her mother her father is marrying Juana. Juana is mad at Hector for letting his wife move in with him again.
episodes.title: Episode 98

episodes.synopsis: Arturo decides to stay with Teresa in Europe instead of returning for the Saenz case. Mayra receives the proof that Ruben stole the money.
episodes.title: Episode 99

episodes.synopsis: Hector and Juana go to dinner and resolve their differences. Mariano tells Teresa the apartment he shares with Aida is the product of his hard work.
episodes.title: Episode 100

episodes.synopsis: Fernando asks Luisa to marry him again. Johnny finds out the food he delivers for Gema contains drugs. Aurora asks her mother to forget her father.
episodes.title: Episode 101

episodes.synopsis: Arturo confesses to Teresa that his entire fortune is tied up in Saenz's businesses and if he loses the case, he loses all his money.
episodes.title: Episode 102

episodes.synopsis: Mayra sends Ruben to jail for the money he stole. Teresa convinces her husband not to bail him out. Johnny tells Mariano Fito threatened him.
episodes.title: Episode 103

episodes.synopsis: Aurora hears her mother ask her father for money to pretend to be good. Johnny presses charges against Fito and Gema.
episodes.title: Episode 104

episodes.synopsis: Fito threatens to make Teresa a widow if she doesn't give him more money. Martin returns from Paris and asks Aurora to give him another chance.
episodes.title: Episode 105

episodes.synopsis: Fito asks Teresa for money in exchange for the papers he stole from her father. Teresa doesn't receive the complete paperwork for the Saenz case.
episodes.title: Episode 106

episodes.synopsis: Arturo tells Teresa he lost the Saenz case and his fortune along with it. Teresa tells Fernando Arturo is bankrupt.
episodes.title: Episode 107

episodes.synopsis: Arturo confesses to Fernando he's selling his house because he's bankrupt. Fito assaults Johnny for his betrayal. Saenz can't take it anymore.
episodes.title: Episode 108

episodes.synopsis: Margarita Saenz is driven mad by her husband's death and shoots Teresa. Mariano is devastated to hear Teresa gave her life to save her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 109

episodes.synopsis: Mariano can't get over Teresa and decides to leave Aida. Aurora agrees to marry Martin. Mariano tells Arturo Teresa may remain paralyzed forever.
episodes.title: Episode 110

episodes.synopsis: Aida visits Teresa to mock her and tell her she'll be paralyzed for life. Aurora asks Juana to make her a wedding dress. Teresa vows to walk again.
episodes.title: Episode 111

episodes.synopsis: Teresa wakes from a coma and is shocked when she doesn't feel her body. Genoveva finds out Fito killed Paulo. Fernando buys Arturo's house for Luisa.
episodes.title: Episode 112

episodes.synopsis: Mariano agrees to buy the rings for Aurora's wedding. Teresa has recovered sensation, and will be able to walk again. Mariano and Aurora kiss.
episodes.title: Episode 113

episodes.synopsis: Teresa tells Mariano she won't leave her husband now that he's broke. Fernando confesses to Arturo that he bought the house. Esparanza has her baby.
episodes.title: Episode 114

episodes.synopsis: Oriana hears Cutberto say Teresa slept with Mariano the day before the wedding. Arturo confesses to Teresa he's selling to pay off his debts.
episodes.title: Episode 115

episodes.synopsis: Teresa gives Fito her car so he'll leave her alone. Aurora and Martin plan to move to France. Teresa regains the ability to walk.
episodes.title: Episode 116

episodes.synopsis: Aida meets her half-brother. Oriana tells Arturo Teresa slept with Mariano the day before the wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 117

episodes.synopsis: Teresa confesses to Arturo that she was with Mariano the day before the wedding. Arturo decides to forgive her but he plans to take revenge.
episodes.title: Episode 118

episodes.synopsis: Arturo makes Fernando promise not to reveal Teresa's secret. Teresa finds out Oriana gave it away. Mariano kisses Aurora. Teresa plays the victim.
episodes.title: Episode 119

episodes.synopsis: Martin breaks off his engagement with Aurora to set her free. Hector asks Mariano to leave his daughter alone. Arturo decides to live with Teresa.
episodes.title: Episode 120

episodes.synopsis: Teresa agrees to live with Arturo in the neighborhood. Aurora asks Mariano to stay away from her. Cutberto confesses he told Oriana about Teresa.
episodes.title: Episode 121

episodes.synopsis: Oriana and Aida go to the neighborhood to mock Teresa. Juana tells Teresa Mariano is always after Aurora.
episodes.title: Episode 122

episodes.synopsis: Teresa finds out Mariano is falling for Aurora. Fernando tells Teresa he's getting married in a month. Ruben and Fito plan to steal Esperanza's son.
episodes.title: Episode 123

episodes.synopsis: Mariano asks Juana to tell him where he can find Aurora. Fernando and Luisa move to Arturo's house. Paty's grandfather recovers from the operation.
episodes.title: Episode 124

episodes.synopsis: Teresa pretends her taxi is broken down so Mariano will give her a ride home. Arturo catches Teresa with Mariano, gets angry, and tries to abuse her.
episodes.title: Episode 125

episodes.synopsis: Fernando and Teresa kiss. She tells him she has feelings for him. Arturo gets drunk after Teresa leaves him. Arturo and Teresa move to Fernando's.
episodes.title: Episode 126

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza's son has bronchopneumonia. Arturo confesses he took Teresa to the neighborhood to test her love for him. Luisa runs into an old friend.
episodes.title: Episode 127

episodes.synopsis: Mayra tells Ruben she's in love with another man. Arturo and Teresa move to Fernando's. Cutberto assures Juana he doesn't mind if she's sterile.
episodes.title: Episode 128

episodes.synopsis: Juana tells Teresa she loves Cutberto. Teresa is jealous because Lucia is going to work with Arturo. Mayra finds out Ruben has been seeing Genoveva.
episodes.title: Episode 129

episodes.synopsis: Juana refuses to marry Hector. Oriana and Aida plan to take Arturo's stock in Luna Turquesa. Fernando tells Teresa Arturo will keep testing her.
episodes.title: Episode 130

episodes.synopsis: Juana leaves Hector for Cutberto. Aurora goes to Zacatecas to help Mariano. Aida, Arturo, and Genoveva demand Teresa sell her stock in Luna Turquesa.
episodes.title: Episode 131

episodes.synopsis: Fernando plans to buy the stock in Luna Turquesa so Aida can't ruin Teresa. Teresa drugs Arturo's drink to make it seem like he's still an alcoholic.
episodes.title: Episode 132

episodes.synopsis: Luisa tells Arturo she asked Lucia for a portrait. Teresa plays the victim to seduce Fernando. Arturo asks Teresa to apologize to Lucia for the mixup.
episodes.title: Episode 133

episodes.synopsis: Aurora warns Teresa that now that she's with Mariano she won't let her schemes get in the way of their relationship. Luisa receives her wedding dress.
episodes.title: Episode 134

episodes.synopsis: Teresa asks Fernando to leave Luisa. Johnny tells Mariano Teresa is too close to Fernando. Mariano asks Teresa not to hurt Arturo like she hurt him.
episodes.title: Episode 135

episodes.synopsis: Arturo blames Ruben for kidnapping Esperanza's son. Fernando asks Luisa to postpone the wedding. Hector won't accept Aurora's being with Mariano.
episodes.title: Episode 136

episodes.synopsis: Mariano tells Luisa Fernando is cheating on her with Teresa. Aurora leaves Mariano when Oriana says he's after Teresa. Teresa asks for a divorce.
episodes.title: Episode 137

episodes.synopsis: Mayra offers to fund Esperanza's search for her son. Arturo agrees to the divorce. Fernando tells Luisa he won't marry her because he loves Teresa.
episodes.title: Episode 138

episodes.synopsis: Aurora comforts Luisa. Fernando tells Oriana he loves Teresa and wants to marry her. Arturo tells Teresa he'll find a beautiful woman to be with.
episodes.title: Episode 139

episodes.synopsis: Luisa tells Arturo Fernando left her to marry Teresa. Aurora forgives Mariano. Armando's heart gives out when he sees Teresa and Fernando kissing.
episodes.title: Episode 140

episodes.synopsis: Teresa hides the reason her father died from her mother. Arturo kisses Lucia thinking of Teresa. Oriana threatens to ruin Fernando if he weds Teresa.
episodes.title: Episode 141

episodes.synopsis: Luisa thinks Fernando will take her back. Hector is still against his daughter's relationship with Mariano. Ruben asks Fito to kill Mariano.
episodes.title: Episode 142

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is surprised to find out Arturo is living with Lucia. Teresa assures her mother Arturo is in love with another woman.
episodes.title: Episode 143

episodes.synopsis: Teresa convinces Fernando to put Luisa's house in her name. Luisa is devastated to find out the house Fernando gave her is now in Teresa's name.
episodes.title: Episode 144

episodes.synopsis: Mariano threatens to kill Fito if he goes near Aurora. Genoveva kills Fito. Teresa finds out Ruben and Genoveva dumped something in the lake.
episodes.title: Episode 145

episodes.synopsis: Teresa tells Aida her father is Genoveva's lover. Mariano is arrested for Fito's death. Arturo will represent him. Teresa tells Arturo what she saw.
episodes.title: Episode 146

episodes.synopsis: Genoveva registers Esperanza's son as her own. Fernando is sick with jealousy. Arturo refuses to take Teresa back. Oriana offers her a big payoff.
episodes.title: Episode 147

episodes.synopsis: Arturo is disturbed to find out Teresa hasn't signed the divorce papers. Teresa lays a trap for Oriana. Fernando signs a power of attorney for Teresa.
episodes.title: Episode 148

episodes.synopsis: Aurora discovers Genoveva has Esperanza's son. Refugio won't accept Fernando as a son-in-law. Ruben escapes with Esperanza's son. Mariano is freed.
episodes.title: Episode 149

episodes.synopsis: Mariano asks Aurora to marry him. Arturo catches Ruben and saves Teresa. Oriana suffers a stroke arguing with Fernando. Teresa mistreats her mother.
episodes.title: Episode 150

episodes.synopsis: Teresa is shunned. Mariano and Aurora marry and enjoy their honeymoon. Luisa is pregnant with Fernando's baby and decides to raise it on her own.
episodes.title: Episode 151

episodes.synopsis: Ruben dies in prison. Teresa gives away the money she took from Fernando. Arturo decides to forgive Teresa.
episodes.title: Episode 152
